text: right Zhou Dawen () (1895–1971) was a politician of the Republic of China. He was born in Wuxi, Jiangsu. He was aligned with the Fengtian clique before joining the Nationalist government. He was the 19th mayor of Beijing.劉国銘主編（2005）、1593頁。徐主編（2007）、896頁。 ==References== ==Bibliography== * * * Category:1895 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Republic of China politicians from Jiangsu Category:Mayors of Beijing Category:Members of the Fengtian clique Category:Politicians from Wuxi Category:Republic of China people born during Qing Category:Chinese chefs
title: Zhou Dawen
